queries.name: WQ1
queries.description: Create new users

queries.name: WQ2
queries.description: Match one node and create another (eager in older code)

queries.name: WQ3
queries.description: Match one node and create another with different label (not eager)

queries.name: WQ4
queries.description: Match one node and create another and a relationship (eager in older code)

queries.name: WQ5
queries.description: Create nodes and relationships between them

queries.name: WQ6
queries.description: Create and find nodes and relationships between them

queries.name: WQ7
queries.description: Create relationships between existing nodes

queries.name: WQ8
queries.description: Find two nodes, create a third (eager even in new code)

queries.name: WQ9
queries.description: Find two nodes, create a third and a relationship (eager even in new code)

queries.name: WQ10
queries.description: Match many nodes and create many others (eager in older code)

queries.name: WQ11
queries.description: Match many nodes and create many others (eager in older code)

queries.name: WQ12
queries.description: Match one node and set a property

queries.name: WQ13
queries.description: Match one node and set all properties with ={}

queries.name: WQ14
queries.description: Match one node and set properties with +={}

queries.name: WQ15
queries.description: Match many nodes and set properties on all (limit 1000)

queries.name: WQ16
queries.description: Match many nodes and set properties on all with ={} (limit 1000)

queries.name: WQ17
queries.description: Match many nodes and set properties on all with +={} (limit 1000)

queries.name: WQ18
queries.description: Match many nodes and set properties on all (no limit)

queries.name: WQ19
queries.description: Match many nodes and set properties on all with ={} (no limit)

queries.name: WQ20
queries.description: Match many nodes and set properties on all with +={} (no limit)

queries.name: WQ21
queries.description: Match friends and delete them

queries.name: WQ22
queries.description: Match friends, delete and re-create the relationship
